What is the outlook for Thyrotoxic Myopathy ?,"With treatment, muscle weakness may improve or be reversed.",NINDS,Thyrotoxic Myopathy
what research (or clinical trials) is being done for Thyrotoxic Myopathy ?,The NINDS supports a broad range of research on neuromuscular disorders such as thyrotoxic myopathy. Much of this research is aimed at learning more about these disorder
